title: Developer Election – Dev League
body:
### Summary
Idle Governance is entering the team formation phase of the Dev League.

This poll aims to elect the Developer(s) that will build new Idle strategies, deploy IIPs and contracts approved by the Governance, or perform security reviews.

[This post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430) collects all the applications submitted between 23th April - 30th April.

### Details
Developer candidates:
- @8bitporkchop - part-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430/2)
- @Bytersbytes - full-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430/3) - [Read the Pilot League feedback](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430/11) 
- @fullstactweb555 - full-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430/7) - [Read the Pilot League feedback](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430/11)
- @gggggg - part-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430/9)

The Dev League starts as a pilot project, therefore the team can not exceed 2 full-time people. **[Read the Pilot League feedback before voting](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-dev-league-open-applications/430/11)**.

If selected candidates will cover fewer positions, an ongoing application process will be set up, letting new candidates join the League. The process will consist of an initial application bounty to test Solidity development skills, with a following Governance & League election to include the new member in the team. 

Selected applicants will enter a 3-week sprint phase, where they would receive the midpoint compensation for their seniority level. After this bootstrap sprint, Supervisors will define the final compensation package. In this timeframe, SVs have the right to upgrade/downgrade if it’s clear that the proposed seniority level is not matched.

Each address can only vote for one choice and it is not possible to split the voting power (this is how the current Snapshot polls work). Note that you can change your vote at any moment, therefore if the name you chose is already in the top positions, you can switch the selection and pick another preferred profile.

### Other References:
- [A Step Towards Idle Leagues – Dev & Treasury](https://gov.idle.finance/t/a-step-towards-idle-leagues-dev-treasury/419) 
- [About Idle Leagues](https://idlefinance.medium.com/about-idle-leagues-73fa538f18e5)

### Vote Options
A candidate is successfully elected if reached at least 10’000 IDLE votes. Please note that it's possible to change the votes at any moment till the voting window is closed.

Please cast your vote on one of the following options:
- Elect @8bitporkchop
- Elect @Bytersbytes
- Elect @fullstactweb555
- Elect @gggggg
- None of the above/Discuss more
author: 0x30723bb508E84706297EeF689C20096907023897
